***Major Responsibilities***

Working at Divisional Forest Office, Baitadi, (remotely located area), I was responsible in following tasks:

-   Implementing national policy and legislation in order to fulfill the demand and supply of forest products.
-   Preparing livelihood plans for leasehold forestry program designed for people under poverty line.
-   Conducting several social surveys for collection quantitative and qualitative information on effect of overall forest management activities.

***Project highlights***

-   Governance and situation analysis of a agriculture cooperatives using spiderweb tool and SWOT analysis method in Baitadi district.
